rows.label: qev092201_MSG0004
rows.name: I see. Homesickness for Earth has you crying yourself to sleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0005
rows.name: I know it's silly. I should just tough it out and get over it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Not at all. I miss Earth as much as you do.
I think everyone here does.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0007
rows.name:
There's no reason to feel shame or guilt about it.
This is a trauma we all share.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Really? I didn't think people as strong as you
still thought about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Of course we do. And I know this is hard,
so I appreciate your courage in bringing it up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0010
rows.name:
No, no, thank you. I feel bad taking up
so much of your time with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's my pleasure. And any time you feel this way again,
come find me, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0012
rows.name:
I hope sharing this burden will help you begin
to heal and move forward with life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0013
rows.name: It will. Thanks so much, Hope![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0014
rows.name: I just assumed you BLADEs were all serious, scary types.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0015
rows.name:
I couldn't have been more off the mark.
I'm really glad I decided to talk to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0016
rows.name: All right, then. Next client, please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0017
rows.name:
I apologize for the wait.
Now then, how can I help you today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Hope what she does, exactly.

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0020
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Hope you're struggling to find 10 natural pearls.

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Oh, everything from giving directions
to solving crimes to life counseling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0019
rows.name: It all fits under the Mediator umbrella.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0020
rows.name: So if anything's troubling you, feel free to share.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Oh, are you in this line of work as well?
Thank you for your service.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0022
rows.name: ...So then. You're searching for 10 natural pearls, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0023
rows.name:
I have a pearl necklace here that should suffice,
if you're amenable?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0024
rows.name: Hope, no! That necklace is a memento of your father![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0025
rows.name:
You can't keep giving things away
to the first stranger who asks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0026
rows.name:
No, it's all right. I'm certain my father would be pleased
if it made someone happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0027
rows.name:
Here, it's yours. And please don't worry about it.
I hope it helps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0028
rows.name: Are you sure? Like, REALLY sure?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0029
rows.name:
It's sweet how you always worry, Ornella.
You remind me of my mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0030
rows.name: You've been watching out for me ever since we landed here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0031
rows.name: Oh, but we're keeping clients waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0032
rows.name: Ah, yeah, I guess. ...All right, next please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0033
rows.name: Heya, Hope. I need advice in a big bad way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0034
rows.name:
My, we're getting a lot of BLADEs today.
Do you need help with a mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0035
rows.name: No, this is more...personal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0036
rows.name:
So, um... Do you know if these mimeosome
bodies can...you know. Conceive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0037
rows.name: As in...children?! I, uh... Um...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0038
rows.name:
See, I've started living with this guy,
and we've been talking, and...You know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0039
rows.name:
Y-yes, of course. Though, I'm, uh...I'm afraid
that's a bit outside my...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0040
rows.name: Er, what about you? Do you know anything about this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0031
rows.name:
Say that the world must be made safe
before thinking about bringing children into it.

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0040
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say that bringing children into a
world like this is selfish and wrong.

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0041
rows.name: Yes! Exactly! What an insightful observation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0042
rows.name:
In other words, if you focus on achieving BLADE's goals,
eventually everything will work out fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0043
rows.name:
I...see. I guess that makes sense.
And it's great motivation to work hard, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0044
rows.name: All right, well...thanks to you both for the advice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0045
rows.name: Phew! Thank you. I was really thrown for a loop there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0046
rows.name:
Oh. Wow. You're...really blunt.
But I see where you're coming from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0047
rows.name: I suppose we do have bigger worries at the moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0049
rows.name: But every mission we do helps to change that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Which means I have to do my best!
Aw, thanks, Hope. I feel way better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0051
rows.name: Er, sorry to make you be the one to handle that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0052
rows.name: But I appreciate it. I just blanked on what to tell her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0053
rows.name: Next in line, step up, please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0054
rows.name: Lularita needs mega favor mega fast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0055
rows.name: Well, this sounds serious. What can I help you with?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0056
rows.name:
Drongo Caravan is under attack
from awful beasties in Cauldros![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0057
rows.name: BLADE lady must stop monsters and save caravan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0058
rows.name: Oh, that's terrible! But I'm afraid I'm only a Mediator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0059
rows.name:
I don't have the training or equipment
to take on a mission like that by myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0060
rows.name: BLADE lady not help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0060_02
rows.name:
Lularita heard you solve problems for free.
Came long way to demand aid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0061
rows.name: This total fraud![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0061_2
rows.name: Drongo Caravan doomed! So many Nopon die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0062
rows.name:
I'm so, so sorry, but this is something
I just can't handle alone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0050
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0051
rows.name: Offer to assist Hope with the problem.

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0060
rows.name: Watch

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0061
rows.name: Wait and see what happens.

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0063
rows.name: You'd do that?! Goodness, I don't know what to... Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0064
rows.name:
I know I can't do everything,
but it still pains me to sit by while people suffer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0065
rows.name:
Lularita count on friends. Lularita explain messy details
when friends come to caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0066
rows.name:
Thank you again for offering to help.
I suppose this means we'll be traveling to Cauldros together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0067
rows.name:
My name is Hope Alanzi.
I'll do my best not to get in the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0068_m
rows.name:
What about lazy friend?
Two of you together are strong enough to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0068_f
rows.name:
What about lazy friend?
Two of you together are strong enough to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0069_m
rows.name: Um, us? The two of us? Help you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0069_f
rows.name: Um, us? The two of us? Help you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0070
rows.name:
Lularita count on friends.
Lularita explain messy details when friends come to caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0071
rows.name:
Well that certainly escalated quickly.
I don't suppose you'd help, would you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0072
rows.name:
Please? It seems like she's going regardless,
and without you, she's likely to get killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0073
rows.name: I'd really appreciate it! I promise not to get in your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0074
rows.name: Together, I just know we can keep these poor Nopon safe.[ST:wait ]
